title: Literacy rate in South Africa 2015
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing Adult total, Adult male, and Adult female. The y axis denotes Share of population ages 15 and above and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Adult total, and Adult female are gradually increasing, Adult male is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Adult male, 2. Adult total, and lastly, 3. Adult female.
Throughout the period, Adult male generally had the highest Share of population ages 15 and above relative to others with an average of 94.13, and it reached its maximum at 2015 with a value of 95.4.
Followed by Adult total which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 92.8 Share of population ages 15 and above,reaching its highest point  at 2015 with a value of 94.3.
Adult female mostly had the least Share of population ages 15 and above with a mean value of 91.66, which peaked at 2015 with a value of 93.41.
The minimum Share of population ages 15 and above about 87.04, occured at 2007 by Adult female.
yAxis: Share of population ages 15 and above
